title: Thy Word Is Like A Garden, Lord

v1: Thy Word is like a garden, Lord,
And everyone who seeks may pluck,
Thy Word is like a deep, deep mine,
Are hidden in its mighty depths
v2: Thy Word is like a starry host:
Are seen to guide the traveler,
Thy Word is like an armory,
And find, for life's long battle day,
v3: O may I love Thy precious Word,
May I its fragrant flowers glean,
O may I find my armor there,
I'll learn to fight with every foe
v4: Word of the ever living God,
Without Thee how could earth be trod,
Lord, grant us all aright to learn
And to its heav'nly teaching turn,
